name: School Days Mod
description:
School Days is a game made by MDickie, and the successor of Hard Time. The goal of the game is to graduate school without getting suspended or getting brutalized to the point of getting rushed to the hospital. You can report someone to the principal if you are a teacher and civillian. The premium version of school days allows you to continue your game even if you graduated or got expelled. 

This project is free or donation meaning you may dowload it for free but we do accept donations, we would really appriciate the people that donate and take the time to try our mods.
